TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A drug containing a radioactive isotope that is used in the diagnosis and treatment of cancer.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "holmium Ho 166 DOTMP"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "holmio Ho 166 DOTMP"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Medicamento que contiene un isótopo radiactivo que se usa para el diagnóstico y el tratamiento del cáncer.
